desc: The Fusion Drill Attachment Cultivator is designed to turn your cordless drill into a powerful working garden cultivator. You have the power, we have the tools. Drill powered cultivators make mixing your soil in your raised bed garden easy.

layout.text: YOU HAVE THE POWER, WE HAVE THE TOOLS
THE FUSION DRILL-POWERED ADAPTIVE CULTIVATOR IS DESIGNED TO PUT YOUR DRILL TO WORK IN YOUR RAISED BED GARDEN .
